mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.t_div FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.reviewer = m.member_id JOIN product p ON r.reviewee = p.product_seller JOIN trade t ON r.reviewer = t.buy_mem_id WHERE reviewer = t.buy_mem_id AND t.t_div = 1;

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.t_div,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price, p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id and t.t_div = 1;

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.t_div,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id and t.t_div = 2;
mapper.insert: insert into review(reviewee, reviewer, rv_score, rv_content) values(#{reviewee},#{reviewer},#{rv_score},#{rv_content});
